name: Master of Pieces © Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Free high-quality Jigsaws with lot of features


- Multiple puzzle pieces selection!
- Useful Zoom to control the whole puzzle surface
- Magnifier tool
- Customizable background color
- Wide cutout range
- Light UI and Hotkeys feature for easy gameplay
- Incredible HD pictures, no blurry pieces
- Relaxing soundtrack
- Permanent updates of Free Images
